sentence: As of April 4, 2019, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) reported that there are individual cases of measles confirmed in 15 states, resulting in a total of 465 reported cases as compared to 372 in 2018 (Figure 1) [3-4].

A total number of nine peer-reviewed articles were used to address anti-vaccine sentiment and vaccine hesitancy (Figure 2).
